question: Which Indian city hosted the Global Conference on Pharmaceutical and Medical Devices, 2019?
explanation: The Department of Pharmaceuticals (DoP), Ministry of Chemicals and Fertilizers, along with Federation of Indian Chambers of Commerce & Industry (FICCI), organised the 4th International Conference on Pharmaceutical & Medical Device sector India Pharma 2019 & India Medical Device 2019 on 18th â€“ 19th February 2019 in Bengaluru, Karnataka.
